message: The trafficking of slave labor and of people, especially children, to work in the sex trade is a growing problem, including even here in Alabama.

data.description: The Alabama Human Trafficking Task Force is hosting the Alabama Human Trafficking Summit on Friday, February 8 from 9:00 a.m. to 4:45 p.m. This year’s event is in Montgomery at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Hotel and Conference Center at 300 Tallapoosa Street in Montgomery. data.title: Alabama Human Trafficking Summit will be Feb. 8 — Alabama Political Reporter
